titleStmt.title: The freedom of preaching or Spiritual gifts defended: proving that all men endowed with gifts and abilities may teach and preach the Word of God. By D. Lupton, servant of Jesus Christ in the work of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Lupton, Donald, d. 1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.W. for R. Harford, at the Bible and States Arms in Little-Brittain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
